title: Bernie Sanders Comes Out as a Millionaire & 2020 Democrats Seek the Black Vote | Oprah Winfrey
itunes:title: Bernie Sanders Comes Out as a Millionaire & 2020 Democrats Seek the Black Vote | Oprah Winfrey
description:
Steve Mnuchin gets schooled by Maxine Waters, Roy Wood Jr. reacts to black voter outreach from Democrats, and Oprah Winfrey discusses her book "The Path Made Clear."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
